nodes.text: Wonn Uzalg was a Rebel Alliance attaché during the Battle of Endor.

At the request of Commander Gennad Rozhdenst and Kodir of Kuhlvult, Wonn Uzalg traveled to Kuat on an emergency basis during the Battle of Endor. He was presented with evidence, by Kodir, that incorrectly implicated Kuat of Kuat in a scheme against the Rebellion.
After weighing the evidence, Uzalg installed Kodir as head of Kuat Drive Yards and promised no surprise if something should happen to Kuat of Kuat.
